// Press the common keyboard shortcut Control+S or Meta+S to trigger a "Save" operation.  
await page.keyboard.press('ControlOrMeta+S');
context: Multiple methods like [locator.click()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-click) or [locator.press()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-press) now support a `ControlOrMeta` modifier key. This key maps to `Meta` on macOS and maps to `Control` on Windows and Linux.
